clinical_study.brief_title: Alternating Icotinib and Chemotherapy for Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer With EGFR Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Armed Phase ⅡStudy of Alternating Icotinib and Chemotherapy for Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer With EGFR Mutation

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, open, single-center, phase Ⅱ study to assess the efficacy and safety of alternating Icotinib and chemotherapy for advanced non-small cell lung cancer with EGFR mutation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the day confirmed NSCLC to the day of first detecting progression, up to 24 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the day confirmed NSCLC to the day of death, up to 36 months

arm_group.description: Icotinib: Icotinib for 18 weeks, 125mg Tid，PO. Chemotherapy: pemetrexed 500mg/m2 iv , 4 cycles. carboplatin AUC=5 iv ,4 cycles. Then continue with Icotinib, 125mg Tid，PO. until disease progression.

intervention.description: All cases that meet the criteria take Icotinib for 18 weeks, If there is no disease progression, then after 14 days of washout period, received 4 cycles of pemetrexed / carboplatin. After the chemotherapy, continue with Icotinib, 125mg Tid，PO. until disease progression.

All cases that meet the criteria take Icotinib for 18 weeks, If there is no disease progression, then after 14 days of washout period, received 4 cycles of pemetrexed / carboplatin (standard solution, 3 weeks for a cycle of chemotherapy : pemetrexed 500mg/m2 iv , 4 cycles. carboplatin AUC=5 iv ,4 cycles.). After the chemotherapy, continue with Icotinib, 125mg Tid，PO. until disease progression.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Histological or cytological confirmation of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) in phase ⅢB or phase Ⅳ.
2. Positive EGFR mutation(19 exon or 21 exon)。
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Previous usage of EGFR-TKI or antibody to EGFR: gefitinib, erlotinib, herceptin, erbitux.
2. Severe systemic disease out of control such as unstable or uncompensated respiratory,cardiac,liver,renal diseases.
3. Allergic to icotinib
4. metastases of spinal cord, meninges or meningeal.
